ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Vulois looks at Hell Beast. Thank you, sir. You will not forget this. Just than Vulois looked outside and saw Soundwave with the TM3 driver. He com-linked

Vulois looks at Hell Beast.

"Thank you, sir. You will not forget this."


Just than Vulois looked outside and saw Soundwave with the TM3 
driver. He com-linked him.

"Come in Soundwave. Hell Beast is with me.He will take the driver 
now."

Vulois also sends a message to Battera.

"Battera, please join us at the Pred base. You have a new position, 
and will be fully accepted into the Predacons."
